Summary: it was like a skateboard with lights, definitely not human!!!!
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Woburn
There were no other sightings in Woburn on or around September 20th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing on my porch at the top of a hill in Woburn MA, it was cold i remember i was just finishing smoking a cigarette when i looked up and saw what appeared to be a massive flying craft, rectangular in shape. it was approximately 400 meters across and about 100 meters wide, it was HUGE! i saw two circular lights rotating (like turbines) and pulsating different colors as it hovered overhead. it made its was to the left of the property over a graveyard to the left of my apartment house in the matter of seconds and faster than anything ive ever seen before and since. it stayed there for less than a second before darting off in the distance towards what appeared to be a radio station with two bright lights being emitted from towers in that direction. i cant explain what i saw...i dont believe it to be a conventional aircraft...
